actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide survivorship benefits for the families of certain severely disabled veterans.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide survivorship benefits under the Survivor Benefit Plan of the Armed Forces for the families of veterans who have a total disability which is permanent in nature resulting from a service-connected disability. Authorizes appropriations for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to provide survivorship benefits for the families of certain severely disabled veterans.
